# Setup

```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sjmisc)
library(here)
library(brms)
library(sjstats)
library(ggformula)
library(broom)
```


Where am I?

```{r}
here::here()
```



## Load data

```{r}
d <- readRDS(file = paste0(here::here(), "/objects/data-modeling-rt-level.Rdata"))
```

# Specify models


This section should be parallel to the lme4 models.


## `m04s` 

Define priors



```{r}
get_prior(rt2_effect ~ factor(mindfulness_training) + mindfulness_score_z + (1|id) + (1|type),
            data = d)

```

```{r}
priors_m04s <- prior("normal(0,2000)", class = "b")
```




```{r error = TRUE}
m04 <- brm(rt2_effect ~ factor(mindfulness_training) + mindfulness_score_z + (1|id) + (1|type),
            data = d)

print(m04)
```
